title: Blocking players and then finding them ingames.
body: So I blocked two toxic players from a previous game who were just ruining the game for both teams, but then in the next queue I find them both queued up together. Why the fuck am I finding players I blocked in matchmaking????

replies.body:
Hey there,

Blocking players only blocks them from your friends list (And possibly their chat from being displayed).

It would be "impossible" for a system to be implemented to "block" players from being matched with you.
